using namespace std;

#define ll long long
#define vt vector
#define mod 1000000007

ll expopow(ll a,ll b)
{
	if(b==0)
		return 1;
	else
	{
		if(b&1)
		{
			return (a*expopow(a,b-1))%mod;
		}
		else
		{
			ll temp = expopow(a, b>>1)%mod;
			return (temp*temp)%mod;
		}
	}
}

int main()
{
	ll t,n,m;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&m);
		if(n>=3)
			printf("%lld\n",((((m*(m-1))%mod)*expopow(m-2,n-2))%mod));
		else
		{
			ll ans=1;
			while(n>0)
			{
				ans *= m;
				n--;
				m--;
			}
			printf("%lld\n",ans);
		}
	}
	system("pause");
	return 0;
}
